Welcome to the most perfect game on the internet

Should you choose to accept your calling and embark on this most perilous journey, you will be asked simple questions.

If you answer all questions correctly, you will emerge victorious and be crowned king of the internet.

If you answer incorrectly, you will be cast into the segmentation fault of doom.

I must warn you, this is not an easy game.

Proceed with caution.
